name: Netrics
overview:
Netrics, Inc. offers intelligent database record matching software in the field of automated spelling and grammar correction. The company provides intelligent search, data quality, data integration, and master data management solutions. Its products include Netrics Matching Engine, which matches data with error tolerance that approximates human perception; Netrics Decision Engine that creates automated decision-models for detecting duplicates, linking records, resolving entities, and other data-driven decisions; Netrics Reporting Engine, which provides details on the state of data and identifies the issues limiting the applications; Netrics N-Mend, a data reconciliation tool that enables the identification and elimination of duplicates from database; and Netrics MPI-360, a data quality solution for patient records, which adds patient search and duplicate detection capabilities to hospital electronic health record systems. The company also offers data services, including data assessment, record matching, and data quality; and expert implementation support services, such as integration of Netrics Matching Platform and custom development of decision engine models. It serves various markets, such as healthcare, government, financial services, membership organizations, and e-commerce.

Netrics, Inc. was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Princeton, New Jersey. As of March 8, 2010, Netrics, Inc. operates as a subsidiary of Tibco Software Inc.
